items.sentence: Tom was blinded by the sunlight when he stepped out of the house.
One thing I don\'t ever want to do again is spend time in prison.
I think that Australia is one of the best countries in the world.
Tom says he\'ll do his best to finish the job before next Monday.
I don\'t think it\'s going to be hard to convince Tom to help us.
If you\'re as smart as you claim you are, it won\'t be difficult.
There was a horrible accident on Park Street yesterday afternoon.
When I entered the room, Tom and Mary were laughing at something.
When I woke up this morning, both of my parents had gone to work.
When the school needed a new teacher, I applied for the position.
Tom didn\'t tell anybody about what happened until he was thirty.
Tom still doesn\'t have the courage to tell Mary what he\'s done.
I wasn\'t surprised when I heard Tom and Mary had gotten married.
The government appointed a committee to investigate the accident.
Tom and Mary sat at an unpainted picnic table eating their lunch.
Tom called the police and reported that his daughter was missing.
Tom is mistaken if he thinks that he can always have his own way.
Tom wanted to get back home before the kids realized he had left.
Tom wanted to give Mary a goodbye kiss. However, she backed away.
Tom told Mary that she shouldn\'t go out in this kind of weather.
